name: pp-up
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Increases a selected move’s max PP by 20% its original max PP, to a maximum of 1.6×. Increases happiness by 5/3/2.
short_effect: Raises a move’s max PP by 20%.

flavor_text.sword_shield: A medicine that slightly raises the max PP of a single selected move that has been learned by a Pokémon.
